body.name: Fisher-Price Corn Popper Baby to Toddler Push Toy with Ball-Popping Action for Ages 1+ Years, 2-Piece Assembly, Blue

features: Classic toddler push toy with colorful balls that pop around inside
Push the toy along for exciting ball-popping sounds and action
Encourages baby to walk with fun popping sounds and action
Helps strengthen gross motor skills and introduces baby to cause and effect
Requires some assembly. For infants and toddlers ages 12 months and older
body.description: As your baby pushes the Fisher-Price Corn Popper toy along, the brightly colored balls excitedly pop around, encouraging your little cruiser to keep going. And the faster your baby goes, the faster the poppity-pop action! A great first birthday gift, this classic push toy helps strengthen your baby's gross motor skills and introduce cause and effect as they push the toy along to make the balls pop around inside.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get ready for ball-popping fun, baby! As your baby pushes the Corn Popper toy along, the brightly colored balls excitedly pop around, encouraging your little cruiser to keep going. And the faster your baby goes, the faster the poppity-pop action! Where development comes into play - Gross Motor: Little muscles get a big workout as your baby pushes the Corn Popper toy along. Sensory: Bright colors and exciting popping sounds stimulate your baby's developing auditory and visual senses. Curiosity & Wonder: Little ones are introduced to cause & effect as they discover how to make the balls pop around by pushing the toy along.
Features Push along for exciting ball-popping sounds & action Encourages baby to walk with fun popping sounds & action Requires some assembly.

For the Best Possible Start To give your child the best possible start in life, you don’t have to have all the answers or do things a certain way. All you have to do is the best you can, and let your kids play. At Fisher-Price, we’re dedicated to helping you do just that by working tirelessly to bring you the very best gear and toys. Fisher-Price toys are made to help all kids—from infants to toddlers to preschoolers—develop through play, in their own ways, because that’s how they learn best at each age and stage. And for babies, our gear offers simple solutions (more sleep, anyone?!) you can’t possibly parent without.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding fun for kids!
reviews.reviewText: This toy has been around as far as I know since 1987. Kids love it. They push it around the house laughing as they watch the colored balls pop. Well made and will last for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler loves it
reviews.reviewText: It’s noisy but, my toddlers loves this toys and it keeps him entertained. I would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 16 mos old grandson loves this popper. He pushes it everywhere. It rolls smoothly and makes popping sounds just right. . . not too loudly and not too softly. It is made well. There have been no problems with it at all. I am very pleased with this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Childhood Classic
reviews.reviewText: This is one of those childhood classic gifts that every child should have. My nephew loved this gift at his 2nd birthday party. In fact, once he opened it, he ignored every other gift. He would open something and immediately go back to pushing this around. Sturdy, fun and a classic every child should have. Would buy this again for another child. The cost was very reasonable and worth it. Easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Rated for 2 Yr Old
reviews.reviewText: This toy would be great for very tall children. Our 2 year old is tall, but not tall enough to get the right angle with this toy. It won’t pop unless the handle is held almost upright & it’s not adjustable. If he’s still interested when he’s older it will be more fun. Easy to put together, just not ideal for right now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who doesn't love a popper??!!
reviews.reviewText: Just as I remember from so many years ago...now for my 18 month grandson. He loves to push and pull things, and this popper is lightweight, not too noisy, and just his size! Good stuff!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whats not to love?
reviews.reviewText: Come on, this is a classic toy. My 9 month old loves the popping noise, even though its so incredibly obnoxious. It makes my kids happy and entertains them for a minute, its a win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: broken toy as the balls don’t pop up so very useless. cheap toy and it’s not really suitable for walker use as it’s easy for baby to fall over.

works perfect . Impressed with the quality. My granddaughter loves it. It is a bit quieter then the ones they made years ago! Thankfully for that lol. It’s not too loud and not annoying to the ears! I recommend it
Both my daughters (now age 33 and 20) had these as toddlers. Now my grandson will get to enjoy the nostalgia
The child started playing with it right away
